text:
So much #vaccine #misinformation out there! Need to counter clearly and often.

These are 3 I'm hearing (and getting asked about) the most. cc @DrJenGunter @CANImmunize @SOGCorg @CanCovid @heysciencesam @AntibioticDoc @AllergyKidsDoc #COVID19
